name: Landhaus Alpenrose
description: The Hotter family wishes you a warm welcome in their "Landhaus Alpenrose". Centrally, yet quietly situated, only a 2 minute walk from the centre of town, the adventure swimming pool, bus stops and shops. Relax on a deck chair in our garden, and feel at home in one of our well equipped, tastefully furnished holiday apartments with big balconys facing south.
Children's discounts: 0-5 years old free. Final cleaning charge Euro 42.00 - 56.00

Check in:14.00hr, check out: 09.00hr.
Drive in to Mayrhofen at the "Einfahrt Mitte", past the post office and then turn right up the main street until the Action Club Zillertal on the right side.
Now turn up right into the Wieselweg.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description: 50m² (newer house), downstairs, lobby with entrance hall, 1 bedroom, lounge with dining and seating area (double sofa bed), cable - (flatscreen)TV, separate kitchen with dishwasher, electric stove with 4 plates (no oven), micowave, coffee machine, kettle, toaster, bathroom with bath, shower, WC, and one separate WC, south facing terrace/balcony. Internet (WI-FI) for free.

Internet (WiFi) for free.

Big south facing balcony.  Internet (WI-FI) for free.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
